publishSolutionModal.publishKnowledge:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the publish solution modal
**UI Location**: Publish Solution Modal (header)
**When Users See This**: When opening the Publish Solution modal after completing an exercise
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Publish your code and share your knowledge"
publishSolutionModal.publishHelpOthers:
**Functional Purpose**: Explanatory text about publishing code
**UI Location**: Publish Solution Modal (below heading)
**When Users See This**: When opening the Publish Solution modal after completing an exercise
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "By publishing your code, you'll help others learn from your work. You can choose which iterations you publish, add more iterations once it's published, and unpublish it at any time."
tutorialCompletedModal.heading:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the tutorial completion modal, indicating the completed exercise
**UI Location**: Tutorial Completed Modal (main heading)
**When Users See This**: After completing a tutorial exercise
**Technical Context**: Variable `exerciseTitle` must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "You‚Äôve completed ‚Äú%{exerciseTitle}‚Äù"
tutorialCompletedModal.subheading:
**Functional Purpose**: Subheading indicating progression on the track
**UI Location**: Tutorial Completed Modal (subheading)
**When Users See This**: After completing a tutorial exercise
**Technical Context**: Variable `trackTitle` must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "This is just the start of your journey on the %{trackTitle} track üöÄ"
tutorialCompletedModal.accessToMentoring:
**Functional Purpose**: Information about mentoring access
**UI Location**: Tutorial Completed Modal (info box)
**When Users See This**: After completing a tutorial exercise
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Once you start your next exercise, you‚Äôll have access to the mentoring section on your track too."
tutorialCompletedModal.showMeConcepts:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to view concepts
**UI Location**: Tutorial Completed Modal (button)
**When Users See This**: After completing a tutorial exercise on a track that has a course
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Show me the Concepts"
tutorialCompletedModal.showMoreExercises:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to view more exercises
**UI Location**: Tutorial Completed Modal (button)
**When Users See This**: After completing a tutorial exercise on a track that does not have a course
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Show me more exercises"
tutorialCompletedModal.returnToTutorial:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to return to the completed tutorial exercise
**UI Location**: Tutorial Completed Modal (button)
**When Users See This**: After completing a tutorial exercise
**Technical Context**: Variable `exerciseTitle` must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "Return to ‚Äú%{exerciseTitle}‚Äù"
